title: Sans-Serif Font Identification
content:
I was wondering if anybody could ID this font. Thanks in advance.

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v150/unmei\_shinpai/Font2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091103063726/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v150/unmei_shinpai/Font2.jpg)
author: eeht

comments.content: It’s incredbly close to [Felt Tip Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20091103063726/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mark_simonson/felt_tip_roman/?&sample_text=CRANBERRY%20ORANGE%20SCONE%20%241.95&sample_size=24). In fact, the $1.95 is Felt Tip Roman, but the rest is not. [Here are some other options.](http://web.archive.org/web/20091103063726/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/genres/handwriting_fonts/)

CRANBERRY ORANGE SCONE is [Skippy Sharp](http://web.archive.org/web/20091103063726/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/chank/skippy-sharp/). Stewf, good eye to spot that the numbers were Mark’s font (Felt Tip Roman).

- Mike Yanega
